LGBTQ+ & Two Spirit Open Mic Night is open to all.
 ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌  ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌  ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌  ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌  ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌  ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌  ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌ ‌

Dear ##SM_RULE_360 Email Salutation##,

Every person has a story to tell, so take the mic and share yours however you want!

Join folks from the ACLU of South Dakota, the Augustana GSA, the Blot Collective, and Full Circle Book Co-Op for an all ages, inclusive night of performance art and storytelling on Friday, November 8.

We're putting a queer spin on the traditional open mic night with our event partners, and encourage all to attend our first LGBTQ+ and Two Spirit Open Mic Night.

LGBTQ+ and Two Spirit Open Mic

Friday, November 8
Sign in, 6:30 p.m.
Event, 7 p.m.
Wrap up, 9 p.m.
Full Circle Book Co-op
123 W. 10th Street
Sioux Falls, South Dakota 57104

Please note: This link will take you to a third-party website, facebook.com
More on Facebook

No pre-registration necessary, just show up and sign in. Each person is allotted roughly five minutes to share their story.

We look forward to seeing you there,

ACLU of South Dakota
